segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn’t even notice the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she’s completely clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and the girl is just waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so oblivious, it’s frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware she is of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end badly if she doesn’t turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
